name: "Frenzied Nightmare" Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Welcome. I was waiting for you, Shido.

name: Reliable Little Sister, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "With Candy in One Hand" is in your climax area, perform the following action 2 times. "Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character or an event, put it into your hand." (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Don't worry, we will support you with everything we've got.

name: Kurumi Tokisaki
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the bottom 5 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Well then, have a good day.

name: Transfer Student, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose up to 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in your clock, and put them into your memory. At the end of the turn, choose 2 characters in your memory, and put them at the bottom of your clock in any order. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in your waiting room, and put them at the bottom of your clock in any order. If you put 2 cards into your clock, at the end of the turn, put 2 cards from the bottom of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: Before I sit down, may I ask one more thing?

name: "Time-Eating Castle" Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Special Existence" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your stock, and put the rest into your waiting room or on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Swimsuit, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: What do you think?

name: To Save Spirits, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room." "You may choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." "All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn."
flavorText: Don't you want to save the Spirit?

name: Under the Azure Skies, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 If ""Frenzied Nightmare" Kurumi" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have.

name: Restraining Oneself, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character in any position of your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: W-Why don't you use it, Shido?

name: Shido Itsuka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory on any position of their stage. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Take my hand. That's all you need to do for now.

name: "Your Choices, Everyone!" Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character or "My Little Shido", this card gets +1 soul until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Make your choice, everyone. You've got five seconds.

name: Under the Azure Skies, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 3 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [(2) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Expression of Killing Intent, Kotori" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on." 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +1000 power.

name: "The Me From That Time" Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]". 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may 【REST】 this card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: It won't do for you to fall for those words.

name: Proactive Approach, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose up to 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in your clock, and put them into your memory. At the end of the turn, choose 2 characters in your memory, and put them at the bottom of your clock in any order. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in your waiting room, and put them at the bottom of your clock in any order. If you put 2 cards into your clock, at the end of the turn, put 2 cards from the bottom of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: I was distracted by your charming profile.

name: Seemingly-Happy Expression, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: That's my big brother for you.

name: Day After the Date, Kurumi
text: 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place) 【ACT】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Obstructing Existence" in your waiting room, and put it on your climax area.
flavorText: I was sure you would be absent today.

name: Questioning Gaze, Kotori
text: 【ACT】 [Put 1 "Proposing a Break, Kannazuki" from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and return it to their hand." "Choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: What are you after?

name: Clone, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, this card gets +X power until the end of your opponent's next turn. X is equal to the number of "Clone, Kurumi" in your clock ×1000.

name: Enjoying the Amusement Park, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 2 times per turn. When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Hmph, that's because you're just a kid.

name: Proposing a Break, Kannazuki
flavorText: You should definitely take a break and go to the hot springs.

name: Words of Bravado, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: Could it be that you're scared, Shido?

name: My Little Shido
text: Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and 【REST】 it. If you do, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room." "Choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters, and your opponent chooses 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchanges them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose by this effect -1." "If your hand has 6 or less cards, choose 1 level 3 or higher character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: Oh, the options came up just in time.

name: With Candy in One Hand
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Now, let's start our date.

name: Special Existence
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: But Shido, you're special.

name: Obstructing Existence
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText:
Tohka: "--You are"
Kurumi: "Good day, Tohka."

name: Mysterious Classmate, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your opponent's climax area, you may put this card into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.

name: Yoshino & Yoshinon
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Freezing Earth" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking and gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -2 soul." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your other characters, exchange them as 【STAND】, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Yoshino: "Yoshinon is my ideal. She's who I want to be."

name: Swimsuit, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your level 2 or higher characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Returning to School, Origami
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Apology From a Super Genius" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Swimsuit, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character or "Basic Realizer", all characters in your opponent's center stage get -500 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: "MI-ZU-GI" for short. It's a new anti-Spirits annihilation suit.

name: Yoshino Missing Her Yoshinon
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your encore step, if "Large Tears" is in your climax area, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Yoshino Missing Her Yoshinon" in your memory, put it on any position of your stage, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.

name: Battle Stance, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 0 or lower, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 event card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I won't miss this time!

name: Visiting the Sick, Yoshino
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm sorry... for surprising you…

name: Happy Incoming Message, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may reveal your hand. If you do, and there is a climax among those cards, all characters in your opponent's center stage get -500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Reason for Wanting Time Together, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: That's... not it…

name: Mana Takamiya
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: I'll take over from here.

name: Unexpected Meeting in Town, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of event cards in your waiting room ×1500. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: It's okay. I wasn't paying attention either.

name: Angel Manifestation, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Lonely Eyes, Yoshino" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. (This ability will not activate if this card is not on the stage at the beginning of the climax phase)
flavorText: Zadkiel!

name: Prompt Judgement, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Kusakabe: "You're using the emergency uniform, right?"

name: Gathering Information, Origami
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your stock into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: Pretty please?

name: Shido Pinned Down
text: 【CONT】 Your other "Exchanging Conditions, Origami" in the middle position of your center stage gets +2000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock."
flavorText: I-I don't... think so…

name: Sensing Danger, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their clock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: Date Support, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I'm... sorry…

name: Exchanging Conditions, Origami
flavorText: I'll get off you if you agree to grant me one request unconditionally.

name: Halving With a Single Stroke, Kusakabe
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: Choosing a Swimsuit, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your main phase, if this card is the top card of your clock, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.

name: Basic Realizer
text: 【COUNTER】 Perform the following action 3 times. "Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul."" Put this card into your memory.
flavorText: Origami: "Identifying AST, Origami Tobiichi."

name: Freezing Earth
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Apology From a Super Genius
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Origami: "I'm sorry. I know it's not enough to apologize."

name: Large Tears
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Kotori Itsuka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if all of your characters are 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: The real thing starts now.

name: Dignified Appearance, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: "Terrible Spirit" Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Fearless Smile" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Your opponent puts all cards in their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock." "Choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, and your opponent shuffles their deck." "Choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room. If you put 2 cards into your waiting room, deal 3 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: That won't do.

name: Swimsuit, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Oh, thanks.

name: Power to Turn Back Time, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if your clock has 4 or more cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if your clock has 3 or less cards, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: I can't let you kill me just like that.

name: A Spring Moment, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: It's delicious! It's outrageous!

name: Tohka Yatogami
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: The world has rejected me!

name: Expression of Killing Intent, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Flames Which Pierce Through Time" is in your climax area, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to that card's level +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: If you can't face the muzzle of a gun anymore, then die.

name: "Efreet" Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character or an event, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Return the revealed card to its original place. Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Expression of Killing Intent, Kotori" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. (This ability does not activate if this card is not on the stage at the beginning of the climax phase)

name: Strong Emotions, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Cruel Reality, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When "Brunt of Fury" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Descent of Calamity, Tohka" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Shido…?

name: Descent of Calamity, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if "Brunt of Fury" is in your climax area, and this card is in your center stage, you may choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and 【STAND】 it.

name: Analyst of Ratatoskr, Reine
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm not certified, but I can perform simple first aid.

name: Power to Stop Time, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Well then, let me kill you gracefully, as you request.

name: Wavering Heart, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "If your clock has 3 or less cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck." "If your clock has 4 or more cards, choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn."
flavorText: But that's…

name: A Pity, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, attacks, or is put into your waiting room from the stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: Even though we're on a date.

name: Surveillance at the Bun Shop? Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if all of your characters are 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Shido: "Kotori, what are you doing here?"

name: Meeting up for a Date, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Shido!

name: Great Interest, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: I know a little something about guns myself.

name: Cornered, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Shi... do…

name: "What About This?" Course
text: Put all cards from your stock into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters with "Tohka (十香)" in its card name, and that character gets +X power and "【CONT】 Great Performance" until the end of your opponent's next turn. X is equal to the number of cards put into your waiting room by this effect ×1000.

name: Practicing Hitting on the Teacher
text: Put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 Memory At the beginning of your main phase, if this card is in your memory, choose up to 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in your waiting room, return them to your hand, and put this card into your waiting room. If you returned 2 cards to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText:
Shido: "M-Ms. Okamine, y-your clothes are cute."
Okamine: "What? You think so? I'm a little embarrassed."

name: Fearless Smile
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Brunt of Fury
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: You're the bastard that killed Shido, who was my friend, aren't you?

name: Flames Which Pierce Through Time
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Now, let's start our date.

name: "Rainy Girl" Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 1 or higher character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if there is a character facing this card, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: Yoshinon: "Innit cute? Innit cute?"

name: Important Promise, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your encore step, if "In This Town Basked in Sunset" is in your climax area, you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, and there is no character facing this card or the character facing this card is 【REVERSE】, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: But don't kiss them.

name: Enjoying the Amusement Park, Shido
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I underestimated the amusement park. It was super fun!

name: "For the Sky and the Sword" Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
Kill her, kill her, kill her…
Die, die, die, utterly!

name: Lonely Eyes, Yoshino
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Angel Manifestation, Yoshino" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. (This ability will not activate if this card is not on the stage at the beginning of the climax phase)
flavorText: But I'm a weak scaredy-cat.

name: Naïve and Innocent Girl, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "Delicious Date" from your climax area into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's waiting room, put them on the top of their deck in any order, and deal 5 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Well then, let's go on our date!

name: "Sullen Rain" Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.
flavorText: D-Don't come near me... please.

name: Origami Tobiichi
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from their hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Revenge for 5 Years Ago" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn, put the bottom 4 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal 1 damage to your opponent X times. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I won't let you run anymore!

name: Unexpected Meeting in Town, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may put this card into your stock.
flavorText: S-Sorry!

name: A Spring Moment, Origami
text: 【CONT】 During the attack phase, you cannot return characters from your waiting room to your hand by your cards' effects. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.

name: School Uniform, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when your opponent's character becomes 【REVERSE】, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Is this okay?

name: Long Range Shot, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put 1 "Basic Realizer" from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room." "Choose 1 of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters. That character cannot 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase."

name: A Spring Moment, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters and this card, and exchange them as 【STAND】. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Yoshinon: "Do me, too!"

name: Battle to Protect, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: If Shido is trying to save Kotori with his all, then I will protect him with my all.

name: Intensifying Battlefield? Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.

name: Under the Azure Skies, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Out of the Bath, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: What's wrong?

name: Spirit Barrier, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Sulking, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, you may put it face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Under the Azure Skies, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or lower characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position on the stage."

name: Swimsuit, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card and the character facing this card cannot side attack."
flavorText: What about this one, Shido?!

name: Draw Back in Disgust
text: Put all cards from your hand into your waiting room, and draw X cards. X is equal to the number of cards put into your waiting room by this effect +1.
flavorText:
Shido: "Just be careful on your way to school."
Ai: "Oh? Isn't that Itsuka?"
Mai: "They get along too well. I guess the rumors about his sister-complex are true."
Mii: "That's so lame.

name: In This Town Basked in Sunset
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Tohka: "Then kiss me now!"

name: Delicious Date
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Ooh, Shido, what is this?

name: Revenge for 5 Years Ago
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: That's why I'll kill you. I'll kill you. I'll kill you, Efreet!

name: Trying On, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 [Return 2 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Confirmation of Feelings, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: T-To suddenly be asked something like that…

name: Within the Frozen Barrier, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +X power until the end of your opponent's next turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: S-Shido, this is...?

name: Complex Feelings, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×1000.

name: Meeting up for a Date, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, and put them on the top of their deck in the original order. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent has 1 or less characters in their center stage, choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it at the bottom of their deck.
flavorText: Not at all. I just arrived myself.

name: "Chance Meeting at Dusk" Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Yesterday's Incident, Shido
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "Date Day, Tohka" get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Date Day, Tohka" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Date Day, Tohka" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Tohka: "Hey, Shido! Don't ignore me!"

name: Worst Awakening Method, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 1 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Commander of Ratatoskr, Kotori" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on." 【CONT】 All of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +500 power.
flavorText: Wake up, wake up! Wake up, big brother!

name: Confrontation With Humans, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.

name: Meeting up for a Date, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Not at all. I just arrived myself.

name: Commander of Ratatoskr, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Welcome to Ratatoskr.

name: Engraving Despair, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When "Us" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Search your deck for up to 2 "Engraving Despair, Kurumi", put them on separate positions of your stage, and shuffle your deck." "Choose up to 2 "Engraving Despair, Kurumi" in your waiting room, and put them on separate positions of your stage."
flavorText: Now, let's finish this.

name: Date Day, Tohka
flavorText: Well, Shido? It's time for our date!

name: Maximum Support, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character attacks, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Can I take your order?

name: Overwhelming Emotions, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters.
flavorText: Oh, no, I must be patient a little longer.

name: Hostile, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +4500 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hand." 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: If that's the case, then I'll deal with you first.

name: Us
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: This is what I've looked like at different times.

name: Abrupt Greeting, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your main phase, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText: You don't remember?

name: Fearful Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: Don't hurt me... please.

name: Stopped by the Doctor, Yoshino
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Reine: "You worked hard, didn't you?"

name: Strange Conversation, Origami
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Me too.

name: Cool? Yoshino
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Confrontation With Spirits, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 cost 1 or lower character in your opponent's back stage, and put it at the bottom of their deck.

name: My Little Shido
text: If you do not have a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Option 3 is the most logical. And he'll be able to take control of the conversation.

name: Battle Begins
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: Searching for Yoshinon
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
